data.description: Perl module to read Clarion 2.1 .dat files
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The name for the module is chosen similarly to names of other
    modules from a chapter "Database Interfaces". The name contains the
    name of a product at the top level, for example MySQL, Oracle,
    Postgress and so on.
